name: Soft Matte Finish Face Foundation Primer Makeup, Smooth & Blur Effect, Pore Blurring, Power Eliminate Oiliness, Flawless Skin, Plant Extracts, Cruelty-Free, Clear Texture, 1oz
short_description: The newly upgraded matte finish face makeup primer is an essential oil-control foundation primer for normal to oily skin. It effectively minimizes shine, smooths pores, and creates a natural, oil-free matte finish.

Suitable for all skin tones. The transparent gel texture works for all skin types and tones, delivering a natural, flawless finish. Breathable and non-comedogenic, it leaves skin feeling weightless and comfortable.

Leave skin feeling weightless. This matte finish primer is formulated with botanical extracts including scutellaria root, licorice, and sophora root extract to minimize skin irritation while enhancing oil control.

Gently apply the matte makeup primer to your face using your fingers until it blends seamlessly into your skin. Wait approximately 30 seconds for it to set before applying foundation or other makeup products.

Say goodbye to shiny skin and short-lived makeup. This matte oil-control primer perfectly solves the problem, letting you enjoy flawless makeup all day long. Let beauty accompany you from morning to night.

name: Blurring Balm Matte Primer for Older Women, Poreless Soft-Focus Effect, Oil Control Longwear Setting Powder Balm, Flawless Matte Finish, Smooths Wrinkles, Three-dimensional Makeup Finish #FANCY
short_description: 【Achieve Makeup Mastery】 Our Blurring Balm Matte Primer creates a silky canvas, ensuring your makeup glides on flawlessly and stays put all day.
【Shine-Free Radiance】 Control oil and shine with our Oil Control Setting Powder, leaving your skin with a matte finish that lasts from morning to night.
【Poreless Perfection】 Say goodbye to visible pores with our Poreless Smooth Skin formula, designed to blur imperfections and leave you with a flawless complexion.
【Seamless Coverage】 Our Longwear Invisible Foundation provides buildable coverage that lasts for hours, evening out skin tone and concealing blemishes.
【Soft-Focus Effect】 Experience a soft-focus effect with our Flawless Soft-Focus formula, giving your skin a luminous, airbrushed finish that looks naturally radiant.
product_description: Achieve the flawless, airbrushed complexion you’ve always dreamed of with our Blurring Balm Matte Primer , specially formulated to meet the needs of mature skin . Say goodbye to visible pores, fine lines, and midday shine—this multi-tasking primer does it all. Designed with a balm-to-powder texture, this lightweight primer glides on effortlessly, melting into your skin and instantly transforming it with a soft-focus blurring effect . It smooths the appearance of uneven skin texture, minimizes wrinkles, and leaves behind a matte, poreless finish that’s never flat or cakey. Whether you're heading to the office or out for dinner, your skin will look fresh, lifted, and vibrant all day long. Infused with skin-loving ingredients , the formula is non-drying, ensuring your skin stays comfortably hydrated even while it locks in your look. Ideal for oily, combination, or mature skin types, this primer controls excess oil without emphasizing dry patches or fine lines. The result? A weightless, breathable barrier that keeps your makeup in place—without creasing, cracking, or fading. Use it in multiple ways: as a base for long-lasting foundation, a mid-day makeup refresher, or a standalone blurring balm for those no-makeup makeup days. It’s the secret weapon for anyone looking to master the “your-skin-but-better” glow—without sacrificing staying power or comfort. Let this balm be your go-to beauty essential for a flawless, age-defying look —because gorgeous, glowing skin has no age limit.
